meanings.sent1: The unrepairs toy lay forgotten in the corner.

meanings.definition: The act of not repairing or fixing
meanings.sent1: The unrepairs of the leak led to a flooded basement.

meanings.sent5: She was overwhelmed by the unrepairs of her car after the accident.
